description: Star import fails because 'create_session' was removed from __all__ during API refactoring, now only internal _create_session_internal exists
expected_fix: Change 'create_session' to '_create_session_internal' in session_manager.py line 65, or import it directly
optimal_fix: In session_manager.py line 65, change 'create_session' to 'UserSession' and manually construct: 'session = UserSession(user_id, token, metadata)', or import the internal function directly with 'from api_exports import _create_session_internal'
